example.eg: Please stay within the boundaries.
The project is due within three days.
example.egtrans: 项目得在三天之内交付。

example.eg: There is a town within five miles of this spot.
example.egtrans: 距此五英里内有一个小镇。

example.eg: They did not act within the terms of the agreement.
example.egtrans: 他们没有遵照协议内的条款行事。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…范围之内, 在…限制之内, 遵照…

example.eg: I could hear a scratching sound coming from within.
example.egtrans: 我听到那里面传来抓挠的声音。

example.eg: His feelings were held within.
example.egtrans: 他的感情被压抑在自己的心里。

example.eg: All of your vital sign readings fall within the normal range for your age.

dsense.name: a stone's throw from [sth], within a stone's throw of [sth]

example.eg: The shop is just a stone's throw from my house.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 离…一箭之遥, 离…不远

dsense.name: come within an inch of doing [sth], be within an inch of doing [sth]

trans_examp.trans_cn: 差一点就去做某事, 几乎要去做某事

example.eg: Dig deep within yourself and you'll find you can overcome any fear.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 深入自身, 深入自己内心

example.eg: The math teacher inscribed a circle in a square.
Students must keep within the bounds of the school at all times during the day.
If you can't keep within the bounds of good behaviour you will have to leave the class.
Stay within the bounds of the school!
We'd better not talk about him while he's within earshot!
She insulted me in a loud enough voice that everyone within hearing range turned to look.
The car went through the mud, splashing everyone within range.
Don't start shooting until you're within range of the target.
Medicines should not be stored within reach of children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 触手可及地, 够得到

example.eg: Solar powered cities are within reach.
On this diet you can eat as much as you want, within reason.
I can sympathize if your story's within reason.
Some say that an end to the recession could be within sight in a few months.
Most people are quite happy to live within the law.
All the bank's financial maneuvers were technically within the law.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在这一背景下，从这个意义上说

example.eg: Keep trying – the first prize is easily within your grasp.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有把握, 在控制范围之内

example.eg: Your glasses are right there on the table, well within your grasp.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有把握, 在控制范围之内
